articles.description: The actor said, “Abhi ke liye aap Bad Newz enjoy kar lo, jo hum la rahe hain. Jab uska (good news) time aayega, we won’t be shying away from giving that news.”
articles.content: Vicky Kaushal was present at the trailer launch of Bad News along with Ammy Virk and Triptii Dimri. When a journalist asked about rumors of Katrina Kaif’s pregnancy, the actor quipped, “Abhi ke liye … [+1244 chars]
